text: I applaud these aggressive actions by @POTUS to make sure families can get the formula they need during this shortage. https://t.co/6CDkYDJZvO

Americans deserve peace of mind that their money and their data are safe with their credit union or mortgage servicer.

Families in Illinois have felt the pain of the infant formula shortage firsthand. 

That is why I will vote today to get the FDA the resources it needs to address this shortage & help prevent it from ever happening again. #FeedOurInfants https://t.co/kM07k3YTGK
